newsitem.title: USA: Old Republic to redeem 8-3/4 pct pfd stock.
newsitem.headline: Old Republic to redeem 8-3/4 pct pfd stock.

text.p: Old Republic International Corp said Friday its directors had approved redemption on December 13 of the company's 8-3/4 percent Series H cumulative preferred stock.
The stock will be redeemed for $25.438 cash per share, the insurance holding company said.
As of October 30, 2,192,100 shares of Series H cumulative preferred stock were outstanding.
Old Republic subsidiaries market, underwrite and provide risk management and reinsurance services and coverage.
Trading in shares of Old Republic was halted pending the company's announcement.
